title: Tab Manager
description: Organize, search, group, and manage browser tabs efficiently. Save tab sessions, restore closed tabs, or reduce tab clutter.

title: Bookmark Organizer
description: Enhanced bookmark management with search, categorization, tags, and quick access menus for saved websites.

title: Page Content Modifier
description: Modify webpage appearance or behavior - dark mode, custom CSS, element removal, layout changes, font adjustments.

title: Highlight to Action
description: Perform actions on selected/highlighted text - translate, define, search, summarize, save, or share highlighted content.

title: Video/Media Enhancer
description: Add features to video players - speed control, screenshot capture, download, quality toggle, or custom controls.

title: Social Media Tool
description: Enhance social media sites - download content, filter feeds, bulk actions, privacy tools, or automation.

title: Productivity Tracker
description: Monitor time spent on websites, track work habits, set goals, block distractions, or generate productivity reports.

title: Form Filler
description: Auto-fill forms with saved data, generate test data, or populate fields with common information.

title: Web Scraper/Data Extractor
description: Extract structured data from websites - prices, product info, articles, tables, or specific page elements.

title: Notification Manager
description: Create custom notifications for events, reminders, website changes, or scheduled alerts.

title: Authentication Helper
description: Manage logins, passwords, sessions, or auto-login functionality across websites.

title: Shopping Assistant
description: Price tracking, comparison, coupon finder, deal alerts, or purchase history for online shopping.

title: Content Blocker
description: Block ads, trackers, popups, cookie notices, paywalls, or unwanted page elements.

title: Page Monitor
description: Monitor websites for changes, new content, price drops, or specific keywords and send alerts.

title: Context Menu Action
description: Add custom right-click menu options for quick actions on selected content, links, images, or pages.
